Love Binds Heart to Heart.--Let there be mutual love, mutual forbearance. Then marriage, instead of being the end of love, will be as it were the very beginning of love. The warmth of true friendship, the love that binds heart to heart, is a foretaste of the joys of heaven. . . . Let each give love rather than exact it.--MH 360, 361 (1905).
